meanings.definition: A person appointed to act on behalf of another.
meanings.sent1: The deputy helped the principal when she was busy.
meanings.sent2: The deputy sheriff assisted in keeping the town safe.
meanings.sent3: The deputy dog fetched the ball for its owner.
meanings.sent4: The deputy sun peeked through the clouds after the storm.
meanings.sent5: The deputy firefighter bravely entered the burning building to save the cat.

meanings.definition: A second in command or assistant.
meanings.sent1: The deputy manager oversaw the team while the boss was away.
meanings.sent2: The deputy mayor attended the meeting on behalf of the mayor.
meanings.sent3: The deputy cat tried to open the door with its paw.
meanings.sent4: The deputy moon shone brightly in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The deputy teacher guided the students through the science experiment.
